channel.title: Mrslayerscape staff!
channel.description:
[B]Mrslayerscape - Made from scratch[/B]
Hello ppl im reposting this couse my last post was crap and i dident tell anything about the server well on this one i will!Ok first off this is a really big server its all over and ill list somethings we have made so far :)
[B]NOTE:This is not a silab server dont like her client at all have my own.[/B]
*All bows have perfect hits and arrows *Made full pking melee range and mage *Made it so you can only pk in the wilderness *Wilderness is fully working with mage bank *Made range projectiles and perfect hits *How high you can hit with melee or range depends on your bonus or prayer and the level *How high you can hit with mage deends on your level and bonus *Anti null made my self *Anti mass works perfectly on npcs and players *Faceing npcs and players while attacking works perfectly *Coded new global objects void[still has some bugs] *Auto casting with the staff[I dont take full credits for this i got the idea from wolf auto casting void but i dident leech i made one of my own] *Fixed pking client crash bugs *Redid stream and misc java files *PM system up and running *MAJOR login bug fixed (2 days to find the source) *Fixed a major saving/disconnecting bug *Objects are fixed now *NPC magic (Certain npcs attack with magic) *NPC drops *Realistic hitting on npcs *Re-doing range to handle multiple projectiles and angles *Healing has been fixed *Small update on double projectiles *Half trade bug, still not 100% *Prayer is fully working has so bugs tho Thats all i can think of atm ill post more as i think of them
[B]What i need help on making[/B] *Woodcutting handler *Fishing handler *Specs on npcs and players *Thieveing handler Thats about it it shouldent be to hard :)
[CODE]Fill this out first:
How often would you be willing to code?
Will you stick with the server no matter what?
How good are you at codeing?
Do you have a yahoo acc?
Do you play RS? If you do will you be on the server more then you will be on there? [/CODE]
Owner:mrslayer Co owner:angelis11
Coders: Mrslayer Angelis11 -------- -------- --------
Testers: XpurestrX -------- -------- -------- -------- --------
Thats it for right now i will update if anymore spots come open If you have anymore questions PM me.Pics comming soon.
heres a vid i made just to show you some of the server this is showing the mage ill post another vid showing the range :)
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=veUqgvrTYOU]http://youtube.com/watch?v=veUqgvrTYOU[/url] - mage
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=04hmHQ-dlGo]http://youtube.com/watch?v=04hmHQ-dlGo[/url] - Range on npcs
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kq13045_oIQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kq13045_oIQ[/url] - Range on players
Yes i know the vids are made poorly i had a better cam but it got deleted so im useing hyper cam atm sorry.
Add my yahoo [email]Mrslayer01233@yahoo.com[/email][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2008, 09:18:21 PM[/size][hr]so noone wants to join a good server?

item.title: Mrslayerscape staff!
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

Mrslayerscape - Made from scratch

Hello ppl im reposting this couse my last post was crap and i dident tell anything about the server well on this one i will!Ok first off this is a really big server its all over and ill list somethings we have made so far

NOTE:This is not a silab server dont like her client at all have my own.

*All bows have perfect hits and arrows
*Made full pking melee range and mage
*Made it so you can only pk in the wilderness
*Wilderness is fully working with mage bank
*Made range projectiles and perfect hits
*How high you can hit with melee or range depends on your bonus or prayer and the level
*How high you can hit with mage deends on your level and bonus
*Anti null made my self
*Anti mass works perfectly on npcs and players
*Faceing npcs and players while attacking works perfectly
*Coded new global objects void[still has some bugs]
*Auto casting with the staff[I dont take full credits for this i got the idea from wolf auto casting void but i dident leech i made one of my own]
*Fixed pking client crash bugs
*Redid stream and misc java files
*PM system up and running
*MAJOR login bug fixed (2 days to find the source)
*Fixed a major saving/disconnecting bug
*Objects are fixed now
*NPC magic (Certain npcs attack with magic)
*NPC drops
*Realistic hitting on npcs
*Re-doing range to handle multiple projectiles and angles
*Healing has been fixed
*Small update on double projectiles
*Half trade bug, still not 100%
*Prayer is fully working has so bugs tho
Thats all i can think of atm ill post more as i think of them

What i need help on making
*Woodcutting handler
*Fishing handler
*Specs on npcs and players
*Thieveing handler
Thats about it it shouldent be to hard

[CODE]Fill this out first:

How often would you be willing to code?

Will you stick with the server no matter what?

How good are you at codeing?

Do you have a yahoo acc?

Do you play RS? If you do will you be on the server more then you will be on there?
[/CODE]

Owner:mrslayer
Co owner:angelis11

Coders:
Mrslayer
Angelis11

Testers:
XpurestrX

Thats it for right now i will update if anymore spots come open If you have anymore questions PM me.Pics comming soon.

heres a vid i made just to show you some of the server this is showing the mage ill post another vid showing the range
